page.title: 07Employment
page.content:
The majority of the people in the area work either in{farming}or in { {transport.}Several travel the fifteen miles to {Cheltenham},either by car or on the daily bus. Others travel further a field to either {teach}or to work in{an office.}One person travels as far as{London}in order to get to his office. Some people work at{home} as {artists,printers}or{running bed {and breakfast establishments.}The farms are mainly arable farms but several have sheep and/or cattle.
By far the majority of the people over school age though are regrettably those who have{retired}and come to live in this area.
